mapper.select: SELECT User.name, User.profile_img, User.match_count, User.record, Positions.position_name, Grade.grade_name, Usermatch.match_positions, Usermatch.team FROM Usermatch INNER JOIN User ON User.user_id = Usermatch.user_id INNER JOIN Grade ON Grade.grade_id = User.grade_id INNER JOIN Positions ON Positions.position_id = User.preferred_position WHERE Usermatch.match_id = #{match_id};
